slogan.description: 新一代数据可观测性平台，数据目录管理和数据质量监控平台

feature.title: 数据目录管理
feature.details: 自动获取数据源元数据，构造企业级数据目录；定时监听数据变更情况

feature.title: 数据质量监控
feature.details: 平台内置多个数据质量检查规则，开箱即用；提供告警消息管理帮助你更好把握质量情况

feature.title: 插件化设计
feature.details: 平台以插件化设计为核心，支持数据源、规则、告警组件、错误数据存储和注册中心等插件扩展

feature.title: 数据概览
feature.details: 让你能够更快更轻松地了解每个数据集的情况，做到心里有数

feature.title: 多种运行模式
feature.details: DataVines不仅提供平台帮助你观测数据，也支持本地模式集成到调度系统的工作流中

feature.title: 易部署&高可用
feature.details: 平台依赖少，容易部署；支持水平扩容，自动容错

slogan.description: Next-gen Data Observability Platform, Data Catalog Management & Data Quality Monitoring Platform.

feature.title: Data Catalog Management
feature.details: Automatically obtain datasource metadata and construct enterprise-level data catalog; Regularly monitor data schema changes.

feature.title: Data Quality Monitor
feature.details: Multiple data quality check rules are built in the platform, which can be used out of the box; Provide alert message management to help you better grasp the quality situation.

feature.title: Plug-in Design
feature.details: With plug-in design as the core, the platform supports plug-in design of datasource, rule, notification, error data storage and registry.

feature.title: Data Profile
feature.details: Data profile enables you to understand the situation of each data set faster and more easily, so that you have a clear idea.

feature.title: Multiple Mode
feature.details: DataVines not only provides a platform to help you observe data, but also supports local mode integration into the workflow of the scheduling system.

feature.title: Easy Deploy & HA
feature.details: Less dependent and easy to deploy; Supports horizontal expansion and automatic fault tolerance.
